structure.unit: SCHOOL EMPLOYEES -- TEACHERS' RETIREMENT AND TENURE

law.catch_line: Credits allowed transferred employee of Department of Education or Education Professional Standards Board.
law.text: An employee of the Department of Education or the Education Professional Standards Board who transfers to become an employee of the local school district shall be allowed credit for accrued sick leave up to the maximum allowed for transfers for teachers between school districts as provided by KRS 161.155(4) and shall be allowed credit for each full year of employment with the Department of Education or the Education Professional Standards Board for the determination of pay under the school districts' single salary schedule.
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 52, sec. 3, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 13, effective June 21, 2001. -- Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 479, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 234, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1982.
